name: The Adventures of Golly
description:
The Adventures of Golly and his friends who have to travel across the land and meet a lot of Enemy and puzzles that will take you on an adventure. Game JRPG With unique graphics
Story: golly met each other, a young woman who lost her way. And want you to help And meet a new adventure with The Adventures of Golly

Gameplay: Rpg game, hit the monster, keep level With many puzzles
And what you do will affect the story This game can end up in three different ways.
And ready to adventure with Golly in the game The Adventures of Golly
